sentence.Network_en: Weather satellites have observed a ring of volcanic ash girdling the earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 气象卫星观测到一个环绕地球的火山灰带。

sentence.Network_en: Mount Unzen has been spewing out volcanic ash, gas, and rock today.
sentence.Network_cn: 云仙山今天一直在向外喷涌火山灰、气体和火山岩。

sentence.Network_en: The volcano spewed out more scorching volcanic ashes, gases and rocks.
sentence.Network_cn: 火山喷出更多灼热的火山灰、气体和岩块。

list.abs: 火山角砾岩(volcanic breccia):火山角砾岩为由直径大于4毫米之火山岩片所成,所含之熔岩碎片远较凝灰岩者为多,但玻璃细片及整石较少。有些角砾岩有多量之火山岩.

...化。飞机飞入云层也面临几种可能的危险，比如：雷暴，闪电、云里面的湍流、积冰（icing）、 冰雹等。还有就是火山灰（volcanic ash），如果火山灰进入飞机的引擎，就会破坏引擎，使引擎停止转动。曾经就有波音747飞机在印尼上空因为火山灰.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French volcanique, from volcan (see volcano)

entry.def: Volcanic means coming from or created by volcanoes.

example.ex: Over 200 people have been killed by volcanic eruptions...
example.tran: 火山喷发已导致200多人丧生。

example.ex: Mount Unzen has been spewing out volcanic ash, gas, and rock today...
example.tran: 云仙山今天一直在向外喷涌火山灰、气体和火山岩。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or produced by or consisting of volcanoes;

sentences.sentence: "a volcanic cone is a conical mountain or hill built up of material from volcanic eruptions"

means.word_mean: 3. igneous rock produced by eruption and solidified on or near the earth's surface; rhyolite or andesite or basalt;

sentences.sentence: "volcanic rock includes the volcanic glass obsidian"

auth_sentence.content: It had been devastated by a violent volcanic eruption.
auth_sentence.res_content: It had been devastated by a violent volcanic eruption.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It had been devastated by a violent volcanic eruption.

auth_sentence.content: Historically, so-called volcanic winters have caused catastrophic famines.
auth_sentence.res_content: Historically, so-called volcanic winters have caused catastrophic famines.

auth_sentence.content: Volcanic eruptions also renew the skin of Mother Earth.

means.word_mean: 火山的;由火山作用引起的

sentences.en: covered by a light fall of volcanic ash
sentences.cn: 被落下的一层薄薄的火山灰覆盖

sentences.en: The place was recently visited by a serious volcanic eruption.
sentences.cn: 这地方最近发生了一次严重的火山爆发。

means.word_mean: 有火山的;由火山构成的

sentences.cn: 这些岛屿是由火山构成的。
